author: Jacob Dressler
description:

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Halloween film franchise enjoyed a major revival with the release of Blumhouse’s Halloween in 2018. The film, distributed by Universal Pictures, grossed $259.9 million at the worldwide box office with a $10 million budget. Two less successful sequels were released, Halloween Kills and Halloween Ends, and now Blumhouse boss Jason Blum has confirmed they [...]
